Subject: GRE & GMAT Math 

Background Information:
The GRE (Graduate Record Examination) and GMAT (Graduate Management Admission Test) are standardized tests commonly used for admission into graduate programs, particularly in the fields of business and management. Both tests include sections on math, assessing the quantitative reasoning skills of the test takers. To perform well on these tests, it is important to familiarize oneself with various mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.
